data.title: Steve Chien on LinkedIn: #jpl #jplai #space #ai #carnegiemellon #universityofmichigan
data.meta_description: Had a great time visiting Carnegie Mellon University and University of Michigan this past week - catching up with colleagues, talking about AI in Space, and…
data.text:
I am very pleased to announce the speakes for EmTech Conference by MIT Technology Review. This event takes place in Seoul on May 30 2024. Are you ready to dive into the future of technology and innovation? Please visit this event, where groundbreaking ideas and cutting-edge advancements converge! 📅 Date: [May 30, 2024] 📍 Location: [COEX Grandballroom Seoul] 🔥 Highlights You will meet the future of future technology from AI to Bio. TED style Tech show. #EmTech #Innovation #Technology #MIT 반갑습니다. MIT 테크놀로지 리뷰는 매년 보스톤에서 유명한 기술 컨퍼런스 'EmTech(Emerging Technology)'를 개최하고 있습니다. 이 행사를 5월 30일 서울에서 개최합니다. 최근 가장 각광 받는 AI부터, 로보틱스, 바이오 등 분야에 세계적 지성을 한자리에 모아, TED 스타일의 강연을 통해서, 미래를 접해봅니다. 기술과 기술이 어떻게 산업에 융합하는지 그 미래에 관심이 많은 분들은 이 행사에 참석해 보세요. 한자리 (현장)에서 만나기 힘든 컨퍼런스입니다. www.emtechkorea.co.kr

🚀SpaceTech is in full swing! Join the live webcast now to catch Dr. Steve Chien’s keynote, “Trusted Autonomy on Mars: A Case Study of the Mars 2020 Onboard Planner” Dr. Chien, NASA JPL Technical Group Supervisor, AI Group, is renowned for his leadership in AI deployment across various missions, including the Mars 2020 Perseverance Rover. More keynotes, panels, and talks throughout the day! Watch: https://lnkd.in/embitpuH

An exciting start to “AI in Action” Week at Northeastern University tonight! 🎉 After opening remarks from Kenneth Henderson, Chancellor and Senior Vice President for Learning at Northeastern, hundreds of attendees joined in-person and online to hear a fascinating keynote from Steve Chien, a renowned computer scientist from the NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory at Caltech, followed by closing remarks from our Executive Director, Usama Fayyad! Stay tuned for insights throughout "AI in Action" Week, and learn more about this week’s incredible lineup of #AI-focused events here: https://bit.ly/3IZ9BmC #artificialintelligence #AIevents #AIresearch #space #science #research #NASA #computerscience #AInews
